Title: Relates to conveyances of certain real property involving limited liability companies
Summary: Requires that any limited liability company who is the grantor or grantee in the conveyance of real property provide a document to be accompanied with the filing of a deed which identifies the names and business addresses of all members, managers, and any other authorized persons of such limited liability company.
LawCode: Amd ยง333, RP L; add ยง7-609, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to conveyances of certain real property involving limited liability companies
